data.message: Awweee, look at all the Trump supporters, throwing a temper tantrum just like their lord and savior does 😂 You do realize he gets off on your hissy fits, right? And those of you idiots saying he "supports Hillary" obviously have not listened to his older music. Role Model? Hello? But oook, you're a fan alright. "Not relevant" my ass.... look at how big Rap God got three years ago. Go ahead and throw away your ONE cd, see if he gives a fuck tho 😂 #stansagainstthegovernment

replies.message: If Trump isn't a puppet and if he is actually for the people the CIA would JFK his ass obviously he's still a puppet like all the previous Presidents
